LanguageData.HIDGun_RugerSuperRedhawk.label: Ruger Super Redhawk
LanguageData.HIDGun_RugerSuperRedhawk.description: A rather overkill double-action revolver, chambered for the powerful .454 Casull cartridge and fitted with a high power scope for good measure.

LanguageData.HIDGun_RugerMkIV_std.description: A lightweight semi-automatic pistol. Despite its underpowered cartridge, it remains one of the most prolific pistols of all time.

LanguageData.HIDGun_Glock17A.label: Glock 17 switched
LanguageData.HIDGun_Glock17A.description: An ancient pattern blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but is quick to fire. It can fire fully automatic thanks to a simple modification on the back of the slide.

LanguageData.HIDGun_Glock17A.tools.1.label: muzzle

LanguageData.HIDGun_Glock21A.tools.1.label: muzzle

LanguageData.HIDGun_BerettaM93R.label: 93R
LanguageData.HIDGun_BerettaM93R.description: A micro-submachine gun. It is short-ranged, but very light in the hands. Its rate of fire tends to make up for its weakness.

LanguageData.HIDGun_BerettaM93R.tools.1.label: muzzle
